response:
Neuro-imaging is urgent to confirm demyelination and assess dissemination in space (brain vs. cord). Chest imaging is mandatory to investigate the pulmonary opacity (sarcoidosis vs. infection). Lumbar puncture and extensive serology are required to differentiate between MS, NMO, Sarcoidosis, and infectious mimics.

investigations = ["MRI Brain and Whole Spine with gadolinium", "CT Thorax", "Lumbar Puncture", "Serum ACE", "Aquaporin-4 antibodies", "MOG antibodies", "Autoimmune screen (ANA, ENA, DS-DNA)", "Full blood count", "Urea and electrolytes", "Liver function tests", "C-reactive protein", "Erythrocyte sedimentation rate", "Calcium profile", "HIV serology", "Syphilis serology", "QuantiFERON-TB Gold"]
